title: Burning Touch
description: A YAOI styled novel. This book contains material intended for a mature audience and contains homosexual m/m material.After a life of distorted and ever-changing history, dragons have settled and remain hidden in plain sight - surrounded by human society. However, every dragon knows there is still the ever present feeling of knowing that deep within this plentiful life they have achieved, there is still a speck of threat following each one of them.Following their self imposed rules for the preservation of their race is simple and normal, until not so simple and normal happenings are uncovered.Also, hidden in plain sight, are the ones they most fear, closer to them than they imagined. The time to decide if peace-loving dragons are in fact cold-blooded killers - or not - has come.
author: Laaerie
